sourceNotes: According to the source, Chris Smith came out publicly as gay at a rally in 1984.
Michael Fabricant came out as bisexual during TV show “First Dates” in 2017.
Andrew Reynolds, writing for Pink News, writes that Chris Pincher is LGBT+.
Mark Smith, writing for the Scotland Herald, describes Patrick Gray as a “gay man”.
Layla Moran came out at pansexual in an interview with PinkNews on 2 January 2020.
In the source video, Peter refers too his partner, Gareth, in his acceptance speech.
Jamie shared that they were trans on a post on Twitter on 30 March 2022. Their pronouns at the time of the statement are ‘he/him/his’.
Pamela Brooks is Kate Osborne's wife and has tweeted about this on multiple occasions. This information is corroborated by the MP's Wikipedia page.
Rob Roberts came out on IDAHOBIT 2020.
At the time the tweet was posted, John Cope was the Chairman of the LGBT+ Conservatives.
Olivia Blake tweeted that she identified as a “bi woman” to mark Bi Awareness Week in September 2021.
In addition to the soruce, multiple additional newspaper sources refer to to Kim’s ‘partner’ or ‘wife’.
Wikipedia article links to Halifax Courier article, referencing Simon Lightwood’s “husband”.
Cherwell quotes Keir Mather describing himself as ‘gay man’.
Andrew Reynolds, writing for Pink News, writes that Sarah Dyke is LGBT+.
